metadata.title: PM congratulates Friedrich Merz on his victory in Germanyâ€™s election

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Feb 24 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Monday extended his heartfelt congratulations to Friedrich Merz and Germany's conservative CDU/CSU bloc on their "impressive win" in Germany's recent election. "I look forward to working with the new government to further strengthen the Pakistan - Germany partnership," the prime minister wrote on his official X handle.
